name: Leads Report
query:
SELECT
    l.name AS lead_name,
    l.lead_owner,
    l.location,
    l.executive_name,
    l.post_date,
    o.company,
    o.status_by_company,
    o.action_date
FROM
    `tabLeads` l
LEFT JOIN
    `tabOperator` o
ON
    l.name = o.lead_id  -- Ensure 'lead_id' is the correct column in the `Operator` table
WHERE
    l.docstatus < 2
ORDER BY
    l.creation DESC;
